title: The AMD Hits Keep Coming!  ASUS TUF A15 Gaming Laptop Review
tags: asus tuf gaming a15 gaming laptop
description: The ASUS TUF A15 gaming laptop might not have an exterior design for everyone but its what's inside that counts.  This notebook has a Ryzen 7 4800h and RTX 2060, creating an affordable gaming laptop that has amazing performance and incredible battery life.  In this review we take a look at benchmarks, battery life, build quality and gaming, along with a few other things.       Buy items in this video from Amazon & other partners at the links below:  ASUS TUF A15 -   Subscribe    Review unit provided as a loaner free of charge by ASUS. This video is not sponsored. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #asustufa15 #hardwarecanucks
